pages.text: Wa Ma 'Ubarri'u Nafsi 'Inna An-Nafsa La'ammaratun Bis-Su'i 'Illa Ma Rahima Rabbi 'Inna Rabbi Ghafurun Rahimun
Wa Qala Al-Maliku A'tuni Bihi 'Astakhlishu Linafsi Falamma Kallamahu Qala 'Innaka Al-Yawma Ladayna Makinun 'Aminun
Wa Kadhalika Makkanna Liyusufa Fi Al-'Ari Yatabawwa'u Minha Haythu Yasha'u Nusibu Birahmatina Man Nasha'u Wa La Nui`u 'Ajra Al-Muhsinina
Wa La'ajru Al-'Akhirati Khayrun Lilladhina 'Amanu Wa Kanu Yattaquna
Wa Ja'a 'Ikhwatu Yusufa Fadakhalu `Alayhi Fa`arafahum Wa Hum Lahu Munkiruna
Wa Lamma Jahhazahum Bijahazihim Qala A'tuni Bi'akhin Lakum Min 'Abikum 'Ala Tarawna 'Anni 'Ufi Al-Kayla Wa 'Ana Khayru Al-Munzilina
Fa'in Lam Ta'tuni Bihi Fala Kayla Lakum `Indi Wa La Taqrabuni
Wa Qala Lifityanihi Aj`alu Bia`atahum Fi Rihalihim La`allahum Ya`rifunaha 'Idha Anqalabu 'Ila 'Ahlihim La`allahum Yarji`una
Falamma Raja`u 'Ila 'Abihim Qalu Ya 'Abana Muni`a Minna Al-Kaylu Fa'arsil Ma`ana 'Akhana Naktal Wa 'Inna Lahu Lahafizuna
